Class AttackLastTargetData

Namespace
ECCLibrary.Data

Contains data pertaining to creating the AttackLastTarget CreatureAction.

Constructors

AttackLastTargetData(float, float, float, float, float, float, float, bool) 

public AttackLastTargetData(float evaluatePriority, float swimVelocity, float aggressionThreshold, float maxAttackDuration, float pauseInterval = 20, float minAttackDuration = 3, float rememberTargetTime = 5, bool resetAggressionOnTime = true)

Parameters

evaluatePriority float

The priority for this CreatureAction, expected to be in the range [0, 1]. Typically higher than object avoidance priorities!

swimVelocity float

How fast the creature swims while attacking.

aggressionThreshold float

Minimum amount of aggression needed to start an attack, generally 0.5f - 0.75f.

maxAttackDuration float

Maximum length of the attack. Generally ranges from 7 to 10 seconds.

pauseInterval float

Minimum number of seconds between attacks. Generally ranges from 10 to 20 seconds.

minAttackDuration float

Minimum length of the attack. Almost always 3 seconds.

rememberTargetTime float

How long the LastTarget.target can be recognized for after it was last set. For most creatures, this is only 5 seconds. Does not influence how long the attack will be.

resetAggressionOnTime bool

Almost always true, meaning the creature is no longer aggressive after the time is up.
